title: Meg Thee Stallion and the Hotties Stampede on Record Label
description:
After a seemingly fast rise to fame, Meg Thee Stallion was ready to drop her EP, “Suga,” for all of the Hotties.  However, because of some issues with her label, 1501 Certified Entertainment, she had to ask for the court’s help in releasing the EP and fixing her contract.  Tune in to hear us break it all down! #FreeTheeStallion

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
